title: SVG to PNG Converter

overview.title: Overview
overview.content:
SVG to PNG Converter is a free online tool that transforms scalable vector graphics (SVG) images into high-quality PNG format with transparency support.
While SVG is commonly used for web and UI design, PNG format is more universal for image editing, social media posts, presentations, and printing. Our tool instantly converts SVG to PNG while maintaining resolution and transparency.

steps.title: Upload SVG Files
steps.description: Drag & drop your SVG images or click 'Select Files' to upload.

steps.title: Automatic PNG Conversion
steps.description: After uploading, conversion starts automatically, generating high-quality PNG images. Transparency is supported.

steps.title: Download Converted Images
steps.description: Once the conversion is complete, click the 'Download' button to save your PNG images.

users.name: Designer at Web Development Agency
users.comment: I received logos in SVG but needed them in PNG format. This tool converted them instantly with transparency intact, ready to use on our website!

users.name: University Staff Creating Lecture Materials
users.comment: PowerPoint doesn't always support SVG files, so I converted them to PNG with this tool. The slides now look perfect with the converted images.

users.name: E-commerce Marketing Specialist
users.comment: For our printed product catalogs, SVG isn't usable. This tool helps me convert to PNG format. Both text and images convert beautifully.

items.title: PNG Conversion with Transparency Preserved
items.description: SVG transparent backgrounds and graphic structures are preserved in the converted PNG files. Perfect for logos, icons, and illustrations without compromising design flexibility.

items.title: High-Resolution Raster Output
items.description: Although SVG is a vector format without fixed resolution, our tool produces high-resolution, crisp PNG images suitable for printing, document creation, and web use across all scenarios.

items.title: Completely Free Online Tool with No Registration
items.description: No email registration or software installation required. Convert instantly in your browser. Free for everyone, making it useful in corporate environments, for freelancers, and in educational settings.

items.title: Multi-Device Compatibility
items.description: Works smoothly on PC, smartphone, and tablet. Convert images regardless of your location or device, improving workflow efficiency anytime, anywhere.

questions.question: Q1. Will the transparent background of my SVG be preserved?
questions.answer: A. Yes, if your original SVG includes transparency, it will be maintained in the PNG output.

questions.question: Q2. Can I set the PNG resolution myself?
questions.answer: A. Currently, the tool automatically selects the optimal resolution. We're considering adding a resolution selection feature in the future.

questions.question: Q3. Does this work with all SVG files?
questions.answer: A. It works with standard SVG files, but complex SVGs containing JavaScript may not convert correctly.

questions.question: Q4. Can I batch convert multiple files?
questions.answer: A. Currently, we support converting one file at a time. Batch processing is planned for a future update.

questions.question: Q5. How secure are my uploaded SVG files?
questions.answer: A. All uploaded images are automatically deleted after conversion. They are never stored on our servers, ensuring your privacy.
